resources.string: Are you sure you want to quit this game?
Are you sure you want to restart the game?

Take it in turns to drop pieces into a column of your choice. The winner is the player who makes a line of four continuous pieces.

Lines can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal. The yellow powerball will appear at random and can be used by either side.
